error.contactAlreadyExists: A contact with this phone number already exists in your phonebook!
error.invalidFirstName: Please provide a valid first name! Only alphabetic characters, minimum two.
error.invalidLastName: Please provide a valid last name! Only alphabetic characters, minimum two.
error.invalidPhoneNumber: Please provide a valid phone number! Only digits, minimum five.
home.instructions.paragraph1: Use left hand side or bottom menu to navigate around the page.
home.instructions.paragraph2: Go to 'Add new' page to add new contact.
home.instructions.paragraph3: Go to 'Contacts' page to see all contacts currently saved.
home.instructions.paragraph4: Expand a specific contact and use 'Edit' or 'Delete' buttons to make changes.
home.instructions.paragraph5: Please note you can mark multiple contacts and delete all of them by clocking 'Delete marked' button at the same time.
home.instructions.paragraph6: Important: contacts are stored in the app memory, so if you refresh the page, they won't persist.
messages.contactAddedSuccessfully: New contact has been added successfully
messages.contactEditedSuccessfully: New contact has been edited successfully
